description.name: PayPal Payments
description.tagline: Accept PayPal® payments using our recommended PayPal integration.
description.long:
## WHMCS's ideal way to accept PayPal.


When you use PayPal to accept online payments, you give your customers confidence: PayPal's research has shown that offering payment with PayPal increases checkout conversion **by up to 62%**.

This PayPal integration is **easy** and **secure**. Repeat customers get a faster checkout experience, and you can automate recurring payments and bill on-demand.

PayPal Payments activates the optional PayPal Card Payments integration for an unbranded credit and debit card experience.
features: Vaulted Payment Methods — Securely store payment methods with PayPal Vault ([for supported countries](http://go.whmcs.com/1801/PayPal-Payments-service-regions)).
PayPal Smart Buttons — Offer one-click payments with PayPal brand recognition.
Full WHMCS Integration — Manage customer disputes, issue refunds, and view your PayPal merchant balance.
